availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
Jany 21
The Governor appointed Wm E. Price a Manager of the Western Lunatic Asylum in place of Wm I. Buckner whose term of office expired in the 1st of January 1861.
He approved an account of $40. to Jacob Garrard certified as correct by the Auditor
He commissioned W. E. Eavans Surgeon, T. C Mann Adjutant, C. W. Woods Quarter Master and Nat Smith Paymaster in the Enrolled Militia of Mercer county
He respited for Six months a judgment of the Danville Police Court of $50. against W. E. Waters for carrying Concealed weapons.
He respited for twelve months a judgment of the Kenton Circuit Court of $600. against D. A Layman upon a forfeited recognizance
He remitted the following judgments, to wit:

row.cell: Louisville City Ct. vs. J. Vaughan
Boyle J. P. " " A. H. Tucker
